subcategory.name: Promo Sections
subcategory.description: Ecommerce promo section examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS promo section components to highlight special offers, new arrivals, or featured products with banners and promotional content. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

components.name: With fading background image and testimonials
components.imageCreditsHtml: Images provided by Ugmonk
components.iframeHtml:
Get 25% off during our one-time sale

Most of our products are limited releases that won't come back. Get your favorite items while they're in stock.

Get access to our one-time sale

What are people saying?

My order arrived super quickly. The product is even better than I hoped it would be. Very happy customer over here!

Sarah Peters, New Orleans

I had to return a purchase that didn’t fit. The whole process was so simple that I ended up ordering two new items!

Kelly McPherson, Chicago

Now that I’m on holiday for the summer, I’ll probably order a few more shirts. It’s just so convenient, and I know the quality will always be there.

Chris Paul, Phoenix

snippet.name: react
snippet.code:
const testimonials = [ { id: 1, quote: 'My order arrived super quickly. The product is even better than I hoped it would be. Very happy customer over here!', attribution: 'Sarah Peters, New Orleans', }, { id: 2, quote: 'I had to return a purchase that didn’t fit. The whole process was so simple that I ended up ordering two new items!', attribution: 'Kelly McPherson, Chicago', }, { id: 3, quote: 'Now that I’m on holiday for the summer, I’ll probably order a few more shirts. It’s just so convenient, and I know the quality will always be there.', attribution: 'Chris Paul, Phoenix', }, ] export default function Example() { return (
{/* Decorative background image and gradient */}
{/* Callout */}

Get 25% off during our one-time sale

Most of our products are limited releases that won't come back. Get your favorite items while they're in stock.

Get access to our one-time sale
{/* Testimonials */}

What are people saying?

{testimonials.map((testimonial) => (

{testimonial.quote}

{testimonial.attribution}
))}
) }

components.name: Full-width with background image
components.imageCreditsHtml: Images provided by Ugmonk
components.iframeHtml:
Long-term thinking

We're committed to responsible, sustainable, and ethical manufacturing. Our small-scale approach allows us to focus on quality and reduce our impact. We're doing our best to delay the inevitable heat-death of the universe.

Read our story

components.iframeHtml:
Level up your desk

Make your desk beautiful and organized. Post a picture to social media and watch it get more likes than life-changing announcements. Reflect on the shallow nature of existence. At least you have a really nice desk setup.

Shop Workspace

components.name: With offers and split image
components.imageCreditsHtml: Images provided by Ugmonk
components.iframeHtml:
• Download the app

    Get an exclusive $5 off code

  • Return when you're ready

    60 days of free returns

  • Sign up for our newsletter

    15% off your first order

Focus on what matters

All the charts, datepickers, and notifications in the world can't beat checking off some items on a paper card.

Shop Productivity

snippet.name: react
snippet.code:
const offers = [ { name: 'Download the app', description: 'Get an exclusive $5 off code', href: '#' }, { name: "Return when you're ready", description: '60 days of free returns', href: '#' }, { name: 'Sign up for our newsletter', description: '15% off your first order', href: '#' }, ] export default function Example() { return (
    {offers.map((offer) => (

  • {offer.name}

    {offer.description}
    • ))}
